messages.message: Team Instabase, let's strive for neutral language in our platform. Often, our technical language occurs from habit and not from a curated set of terminology guidelines. I found several instances of blacklist/whitelist that we can change to block list/allow list. We can change Execute UDF to Run UDF. Others? Let's identify and fix. I filed UX-463 for this awareness, we can move to another project if needed. Thanks everyone!
Thanks Barrie! How can we as non trained technical writers identify such words and phrases? I would have never guessed that something was wrong with using the word "Execute"
